attributes.action: Re- Nationalise the Rail Network and Subsidise Public Transport as a Means of Creating a Greener Travel Network in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only sensible course of action to promote more sustainable forms of transport is to have a nationalised, subsidised transport network. Failing this, the car will always be the preferred mode of travel because of its convenience and perceived cost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
